page.title: 01An Introduction to our Area
page.content: The villages of Kimpton and Ayot St. Lawrence are situated in the countryside of North Hertfordshire.The two villages are close to the larger towns of Luton,Hitchin,Stevenage, Hatfield,Welwyn Garden City and St.Albans.Both villages are steeped in historical significance and there is a concerted effort on behalf of the villages to preserve this heritage.At the same time,the villages are busy and active and offer a variety of activities for the local inhabitants. The research for this particular area,concerned with the social and physical amenities of the villages,was conducted by the staff,pupils and parents of Kimpton J.M.I School and Crabtree Junior School,Harpenden. Photographs taken in June 1985 by A.R.Penrose(A),K.Ryder(B), M.F.Alley(C and D).
